unnormalised: Local vegetable vendors at Dadar market are accepting UPI now, can you believe it? Even the small chaiwala near my office in Bandra takes Paytm. unnormalised: I bought veggies worth Rs. 250 from Sharmaji, and paid via GPay in seconds. My friend Neha bought a saree for ₹2500 at Linking Road market and used her credit card, no problems at all. unnormalised: The transition’s been smooth, tbh. Remember those days when ATMs ran out of cash after demonetization? This cashless system is way better. I hope it encourages more local businesses to register and declare their income properly, too! It would definitely help the economy if even street vendors paid GST on the Rs 50 to Rs 100 they earn daily.
